name: ablaze
cure_message: The raging fire about your skin goes out.

name: addiction
cure_message: Your terrible addiction seems to wane.

name: aeon
diagnose: afflicted with the curse of the aeon.
cure_message: The curse of the Aeon wears off and you return to the normal timestream.

name: agoraphobia
cure_message: You can handle the idea of open spaces again.

name: allergies
cure_message: No longer will you suffer from allergies.

name: anorexia
cure_message: Food is no longer repulsive to you.

name: asleep
cure_message: You open your eyes and yawn mightily.

name: asphyxiation_weakness
cure_message: Your susceptibility to asphyxiation damage normalizes.

name: asthma
cure_message: Your bronchial tubes open up and your asthma is cured.

name: attuned
cure_message: You have cured attuned.

name: backstabbed
cure_message: Your back wound heals and you gain full motor control once more.

name: battle_hunger
cure_message: Ahhh, at last, your hunger for battle has been filled.

name: berserking
cure_message: Your insane rage calms.

name: blackout
cure_message: Your senses return to you as the blackout ends.
cure_message_obs: Niuri blinks rapidly, rubbing Her eyes.

name: blighted
cure_message: The venomous vines infecting you wither and die.

name: blisters
cure_message: The blisters upon your skin cease to weep fluids.

name: blood_curse
cure_message: You are able to once again control your concentration.

name: blood_poison
cure_message: You are relieved to catch up with the pace of reality.

name: bloodlust
cure_message: Your lust for blood subsides.

name: blunt_weakness
cure_message: Your susceptibility to blunt damage normalizes.

name: blurry_vision
cure_message: Your vision clears.

name: body_odor
cure_message: Your body odor clears itself up.

name: bulimia
cure_message: You feel capable of stomaching food once more.

name: burnt_eyes
cure_message: The salve soothes your burnt eyes, returning your vision.

name: burnt_skin
cure_message: Your burns heal as new grown flesh replaces the old.

name: chaos_warp
cure_message: You have cured chaos_warp.

name: claustrophobia
cure_message: Small spaces no longer frighten you.

name: clumsiness
cure_message: Thank Varian, the Celestine! Your clumsiness has been cured.

name: cold_weakness
cure_message: Your susceptibility to cold damage normalizes.

name: collapsed_lung
cure_message: As your lungs repair, you inhale untroubled once more.

name: commitment_fear
cure_message: You vow that you shall never be fearful of commitment again.

name: confusion
cure_message: The confusion lifts from your mind and it is clear once again.

name: conviction
cure_message: The sparks fizzling across your body vanish.

name: corsin_weight
cure_message: You feel a lightness in your feet.

name: cracked_ribs
diagnose: suffering from a few cracked ribs.
cure_message: Your rib cage mends as the fractures in the bones heal.

name: crippled
cure_message: Your legs are no longer crippled.

name: crippled_body
cure_message: You are no longer crippled.

name: crippled_throat
cure_message: Your throat and voice are thankfully restored.

name: crushed_chest
diagnose: finding it hard to breathe due to a crushed chest.
cure_message: As your chest heals, you find it easier to breathe.

name: crushed_elbows
cure_message: The bones forming your elbow joints mend.

name: crushed_kneecaps
cure_message: As your patellas mend, strength returns to your legs.

name: cutting_weakness
cure_message: Your susceptibility to cutting damage normalizes.

name: dazed
cure_message: You narrow your eyes and focus on recovering your balance.
cure_message_obs: Niuri narrows Her eyes with focus.

name: deadening
cure_message: You are no longer deadened.

name: dementia
cure_message: Sanity returns to you and you are no longer demented.

name: despair
diagnose: surrounded by an aura of despair.
cure_message: The despair lifts, and a sense of relief washes over you.

name: destroyed_throat
cure_message: Air rushes back into your lungs as your throat mends.

name: disable
cure_message: You have cured disable.

name: disabled
cure_message: You have cured disabled.

name: disfigurement
cure_message: You no longer will inspire disloyalty among friends.

name: disorientated
cure_message: You have cured disorientated.

name: disrupt
cure_message: You have cured disrupt.

name: disrupted
cure_message: You have cured disrupted.

name: dissonance
cure_message: Your dissonant nature becomes harmonious.

name: distortion
cure_message: Distortion has left you.
cure_message_obs: Distortion has left Niuri.

name: disturb_confidence
cure_message: Your confidence is no longer disturbed.
cure_message_obs: Niuri looks a little more confident.

name: disturb_impulse
cure_message: Your impulse is no longer disturbed.
cure_message_obs: Niuri looks slightly less impulsive.

name: disturb_inhibition
cure_message: Your inhibition is no longer disturbed.
cure_message_obs: Niuri looks a little more in control.

name: disturb_sanity
cure_message: Your sanity is no longer disturbed.
cure_message_obs: Niuri looks a little more sane.

name: dizziness
cure_message: You are no longer dizzy.

name: effused_blood
cure_message: You feel completely cured from your loss of blood condition.

name: egocentric
cure_message: Sometimes others are just as important as the self.

name: eldritch_invocation
diagnose: having your vitals disrupted by an eldritch invocation.
cure_message: You will no longer be confounded by an eldritch invocation.

name: electric_weakness
cure_message: Your susceptibility to electric damage normalizes.

name: embedded_axe
diagnose: bleeding harshly from an embedded axe.
cure_message: The gaping wound where the axe was slowly mends as the bleeding begins to slow.

name: emberbrand
diagnose: marked with the brand of the ember.
cure_message: The Emberbrand fades away from your forehead.
cure_message_obs: The Emberbrand fades away from Niuri's forehead.

name: epilepsy
cure_message: Your nerves suddenly calm down.

name: exhausted
cure_message: Your body fills with energy again as you recover from your exhaustion.

name: faintness
cure_message: You no longer feel so light-headed.

name: farag_rot
cure_message: You feel relieved as a the curse of Farag's Rot is lifted from you.

name: fear
cure_message: There is nothing to fear but fear itself.

name: fire_weakness
cure_message: Your susceptibility to fire damage normalizes.

name: flared
cure_message: The glow surrounding you vanishes suddenly.
cure_message_obs: The glow surrounding Niuri vanishes suddenly.

name: flash_blindness
cure_message: You blink as your vision slowly returns to you.

name: forestbrand
cure_message: The forests forgive your transgressions once more.

name: frozen
cure_message: Though still shivering, you are no longer frozen solid.

name: frozen_feet
diagnose: frozen to the spot by your feet.
cure_message: The ice chips away, releasing your feet.
cure_message_obs: The ice chips away, releasing Niuri's feet.

name: glasslimb
cure_message: The eerie wail from your painfully resonating bones dies down as you manage to shrug off the glass limb effect.
cure_message_obs: The eerie wail from Niuri's resonating bones dies down as $HE$ manages to shrug off the glass limb effect.

name: gorged
cure_message: You feel your appetite return to normal.

name: grappled
cure_message: You manage to free yourself from Severn's grasp.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has freed Herself from the grappling.

name: haemophilia
cure_message: Your blood regains its ability to clot.

name: hallucinations
cure_message: Your hallucinations cease to plague you.

name: halted
cure_message: You have cured halted.

name: hatred
cure_message: Your terrible hatred for Severn fades.

name: head_amputated
cure_message: You have cured head_amputated.

name: head_broken
cure_message: You have cured head_broken.

name: head_bruised
cure_message: You have completely cured the bruising on your head.

name: head_bruised_critical
diagnose: affected by a critically bruised head.
cure_message: You have healed the critical bruising on your head.

name: head_bruised_moderate
diagnose: affected by a moderately bruised head.
cure_message: The bruising on your head has been reduced.

name: head_damaged
cure_message: You feel the bones of your head repair themselves, and the muscles knit back together.

name: head_deepwound
diagnose: suffering sliced arteries on your head.
cure_message: Your arteries mend and close as the flesh of your head is repaired.

name: head_mangled
cure_message: Your head is no longer mutilated.

name: head_ravaged
diagnose: torn by lacerations on your head.
cure_message: The deep lacerations on your head mend.

name: heartflutter
cure_message: Your heart seems to stop skipping beats.

name: heatspear
diagnose: impaled with a spear of heat.
cure_message: The spear of heat within you becomes cool and burns out.

name: hellsight
cure_message: Thankfully, the visions of Hell have left you.

name: hubris
cure_message: Your ego has shriveled to that of the average mortal.

name: hunted
diagnose: being hunted by the hounds of haern.
cure_message: You have cured hunted.

name: hypersomnia
cure_message: You feel a bit more alert and awake.

name: hypertension
cure_message: The fiery pain in your veins slowly fades away as the bloodburst ebbs from your system.
cure_message_obs: The crimson glow in Niuri's veins slowly fades away as the bloodburst ebbs from Her system.

name: hypochondria
cure_message: My, you feel healthier than you have in years.

name: idiocy
diagnose: afflicted with the mind power of an idiot.
cure_message: Your mind feels free of its idiocy.

name: impairment
cure_message: Your body feels a little more like its old self.

name: impatience
cure_message: You are patient once again.

name: indifference
cure_message: Your focus returns.

name: infernal_seal
diagnose: marked with the seal of the infernal.
cure_message: The Infernal seal ceases to burn and fades from your chest.

name: infernal_shroud
cure_message: The crackling heat of the Infernal shroud finally dims and is snuffed out.

name: infested
cure_message: One by the one, the parasites plaguing your body screech as they fall from your body.

name: insomnia
cure_message: You have cured insomnia.

name: intimidated
cure_message: You have cured intimidated.

name: justice
diagnose: surrounded by the aura of justice.
cure_message: The curse of Justice leaves you.

name: laxity
cure_message: Your mind sharpens as the inner cogs begin to whirl.

name: leeched_aura
cure_message: You feel warmed as your living aura is returned.
cure_message_obs: Niuri appears to regain a little colour.

cure_message: You wince in agony as a new limb grows from the stump where your left arm was, the appendage weak and feeble.

cure_message: The bones in your left arm mend.

diagnose: suffering sliced arteries on your left arm.

diagnose: suffering from a dislocated left arm.

cure_message: Your left arm is no longer mutilated.

cure_message: The numbness in your left arm fades away.

cure_message: Your heart begins to beat strongly again, and your veins return to normal size.

name: loneliness
cure_message: The awful loneliness leaves you.

name: lovers_effect
cure_message: You shake your head, wondering what you ever saw in Severn.

cure_message: Your susceptibility to magical damage normalizes.

cure_message: Your restraint relaxes as your state of magnanimity fades.

name: masochism
cure_message: You no longer enjoy pain.

cure_message: Your equilibrium returns to normal.

name: mental_fatigue
cure_message: Your thoughts clear as the mental fatigue lifts.

name: merciful
cure_message: Your merciful bent leaves you.

name: migraine
cure_message: You feel less tense as your throbbing migraine subsides.

name: mind_blank

cure_message: Thoughts rush back into your mind as the blankness is filled.

name: mindclamped
cure_message: Your mind is no longer clamped.

name: mindtether
cure_message: You are no longer mentally tethered with Severn.

cure_message: Your body swells with strength as you recover from your recent transformation.

cure_message: The feeling in your arms slowly returns.

name: numbed_skin
cure_message: The numbness in your limbs fades away.

name: oiled
cure_message: The last of the oil coating you fades away.

name: omen

name: pacifism
cure_message: You are capable of offensive acts once more.

name: paralysis

name: paranoia
cure_message: Aaaahhh. No one is out to get you after all.

name: paresis
cure_message: Your body relaxes as your muscles are relieved of their numbness.

name: patterns
cure_message: The warping patterns pop out of view in a wink.

name: peace
cure_message: The unnatural feeling of peace leaves you.

name: penance
cure_message: The Penance imposed upon you has worn off.

name: petrified

cure_message: You begin to feel more like your old self.

cure_message: The bruising on your torso has been reduced.

name: torso_damaged
cure_message: You feel the bones of your torso repair themselves, and the muscles knit back together.

name: torso_deepwound
diagnose: suffering sliced arteries on your torso.
cure_message: Your arteries mend and close as the flesh of your torso is repaired.

name: torso_mangled
cure_message: Your torso is no longer mutilated.

name: torso_ravaged
diagnose: torn by lacerations on your torso.
cure_message: The deep lacerations on your torso mend.

name: troubled_breathing
cure_message: Your airways clear up, letting you breathe properly once more.

name: unblockable_weakness
cure_message: You have cured unblockable_weakness.

name: vertigo
cure_message: Your fear of heights subsides.

name: vinethorns
cure_message: You feel relieved as the last group of thorns leaves your skin.

name: vitalbane
cure_message: Your poisoned vitals have regained their health.

name: void
cure_message: The void surrounding you weakens.

name: vomiting
cure_message: Your stomach becalms itself.

name: voyria
cure_message: The burning in your veins ceases.

name: weakvoid
cure_message: The void surrounding you disappears.

name: weariness
cure_message: Your limbs strengthen and you feel stronger.

name: windbrand
diagnose: marked with the brand of the wind.
cure_message: The Windbrand fades away from your forehead.
cure_message_obs: The Windbrand fades away from Niuri's forehead.

name: withering
cure_message: You feel relief wash over you, the haunting presence gone.

name: wraith
cure_message: The sliver of soul infecting you slowly fades, its essence depleted.
cure_message_obs: The sliver of soul infecting Niuri slowly fades, its essence depleted.

name: writhe_armpitlock
cure_message: You have writhed free of your armpit-jawlock.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her armpit-jawlock.

name: writhe_bind
cure_message: You have writhed free of your entanglement by tied ropes.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her entanglement by tied ropes.

name: writhe_feed
cure_message: You have cured writhe_feed.

name: writhe_hoist
diagnose: trapped within the claws of severn.
cure_message: You have writhed free of the claws gripping you.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of the claws gripping Her.

name: writhe_impaled
cure_message: You have writhed free of your impalement.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her impalement.

name: writhe_lure
cure_message: You wrest your mind free of its unnatural attraction.
cure_message_obs: Niuri's body ceases to move of its own accord.

name: writhe_necklock
cure_message: You have writhed free of your neck-jawlock.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her neck-jawlock.

name: writhe_ropes
cure_message: You have writhed free of your entanglement by ropes.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her entanglement by ropes.

name: writhe_tar
cure_message: You have writhed free of your sticky situation.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her sticky situation.

name: writhe_thighlock
cure_message: You have writhed free of your thigh-jawlock.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her thigh-jawlock.

name: writhe_transfix
cure_message: You have writhed free of your state of transfixion.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her state of transfixion.

name: writhe_vines
cure_message: You have writhed free of your entanglement by vines.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her entanglement by vines.

name: writhe_web
cure_message: You have writhed free of your bindings.
cure_message_obs: Niuri has writhed free of Her bindings.
